Dialogue.Page: Mod: Arcanum Adrift Authors: The Wrong Warp Team
Arcanum Adrift is one of two mods that won first place in the first mod jam held by the Outer Wilds modding community.
This mod adds a unique and stunning location to the game, with the breadcrumb trail to it starting at a Nomai text wall in the observatory museum.
The mod itself makes heavy use of quantum objects, featuring puzzles that require careful alignment of many different objects.
(But seriously, this mod is so good looking, sheesh!)
